title: The Medieval Islamic Civilization - C. 11 (Science, Technology3)
description:
The Medieval Islamic Civilization - Collection 11 (Science, Technology 3):

We have 27 titles here:

-  Al-Khalili - Pathfinders; the Golden Age of Arabic Science (2010)

-  Allan - Nishapur; Metalwork of the Early Islamic Period (1982)

-  Deming - Science and Technology in World History; Vol. 2, Early Christianity, the Rise of Islam and the Middle Ages (2010)

-  Dunn - The Adventures of Ibn Battuta; a Muslim Traveler of the 14th Century (2012)

-  Gabriel - Man and Wound in the Ancient World; a History of Military Medicine from Sumer to the Fall of Constantinople (2012)

-  Glick et al (Eds.) - Medieval Science, Technology, and Medicine; an Encyclopedia (2005)

-  Grabhoff - The History of Ptolemy's Star Catalogue (1990)

-  Hirschler -  Medieval Arabic Historiography; Authors as Actors (2006)

-  Hughes (Ed.) - Fibonacci's De Practica Geometrie (2008)

-  Hussain - The History and Impact of the Muslim Hospital, vol. III (2014)

-  Kheirandish - The Arabic Version of Euclid's Optics, Vol. I (1999)

-  King - In Synchrony with the Heavens; Studies in Astronomical Timekeeping and Instrumentation in Medieval Islamic Civilization (2004)

-  Kroger - Nishapur Glass of the Early Islamic Period (1995)

-  Leiser & Al-Khaledy - Questions and Answers for Physicians, A Medieval Arabic Study Manual by Abd Al-Aziz Al-Sulami (2004)

-  Lewicka - Food and Foodways of Medieval Cairenes; Aspects of Life in an Islamic Metropolis of the Eastern Mediterranean (2011)

-  Miles - The Islamic Coins (1962)

-  Ragep - Nasir al-Din al-Tusi's Memoir on Astronomy, Vol. 1 (1993)

-  Rashed - The Development of Arabic Mathematics; Between Arithmetic and Algebra (1994)

-  Rashed (Ed.) - Encyclopedia of the History of Arabic Science, Vol. 3 (1996)

-  Rashed (Ed.) - Encyclopedia of the History of Arabic Science; Vol. 2, Mathematics and the Physical Sciences (1996)

-  Shehada - Mamluks and Animals; Veterinary Medicine in Medieval Islam (2013)

-  Talbert & Unger (Eds.) - Cartography in Antiquity and the Middle Ages; Fresh Perspectives, New Methods (2008)

-  Toomer (Ed.) - Apollonius Conics, Books V to VII; the Arabic Translation of the Lost Greek Original in the Version of the Banu Musa (1990)

-  Toomer (Ed.) - Diocles on Burning Mirrors; the Arabic Translation of the Lost Greek Original (1976)

-  Turner - Science in Medieval Islam; an Illustrated Introduction (1995)

-  Waines - Food Culture and Health in Pre-Modern Islamic Societies (2011)

-  Waines - The Odyssey of Ibn Battuta; Uncommon Tales of a Medieval Adventurer (2010)
